summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillProof Social Platform MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI flows 95% successful. All core features working: user registration/login, video upload form, feed display, validation system, profile stats (bento grid), and navigation between pages.
passed_tests: User registration with email, password, and display name
User login with JWT token authentication
Upload form validation (correctly disables submit without video file)
Feed page showing chronological posts with empty state handling
Profile page with bento grid stats (posts count and validations received)
Navigation between all pages (feed, profile, upload)
Logout functionality with redirect to auth page
Error handling for invalid login attempts
All backend API endpoints (10/10 tests passed)
JWT authentication integration between frontend and backend
Form validation and user input handling
Responsive UI components with proper data-testid attributes
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (11/12 tests passed)
